metadata.title: CVE-2020-15395 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In MediaInfoLib in MediaArea MediaInfo 20.03, there is a stack-based bufferover-read in Streams_Fill_PerStream in Multiple/File_MpegPs.cpp (aka anoff-by-one during MpegPs parsing).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-15395` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmediainfo0v5 - 17.12-1ubuntu0.1+esm1
python-mediainfodll - 17.12-1ubuntu0.1+esm1
python3-mediainfodll - 17.12-1ubuntu0.1+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libmediainfo package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '17.12-1ubuntu0.1+esm1').
